Class FragmentAlert

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.argus.sms.app.fragment.AbstractFragment
      • org.argus.sms.app.fragment.AbstractFragmentSend
        • org.argus.sms.app.fragment.FragmentAlert
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.support.v4.app.LoaderManager.LoaderCallbacks<Cursor>, IReportItemsChangeListener, ScrollViewWithScrollListener.IScrollListener

    public class FragmentAlert
extends AbstractFragmentSend
implements ScrollViewWithScrollListener.IScrollListener, IReportItemsChangeListener
    Alert Fragment use to display the Alert screen Created by Olivier Goutet. Openium 2014
